activities: Wayin is a social intelligence company that integrates social content into visual experiences. Wayin receives personal information relating to persons located in the EEA and/or Switzerland which such persons make public through social media platforms. Wayin also collects potentially personally-identifying information in the form of Internet Protocol addresses.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: personal data collected from social media users, customers, potential customers, and others, both online and offline, some of which may be manually processed
recoursemech: Wayin shall submit to the JAMS alternative dispute resolution process as an independent recourse mechanism.
